awd_titl_txt: "Symposium: Molecular and Genetic Organization of Plant     Genomes" August 6-10, 1989 Toronto, Canada
awd_abstract_narration: A half-day symposium entitled "Molecular and Genetic                            Organization of Plant Genomes" will be held between August 6                    and August 10, 1989, at the annual meetings of the Genetics                     Section of the Botanical Society of America in conjunction                      with the American Institute of Biological Sciences at the                       University of Toronto.                                                                                                                                          This symposium represents part of a continuing effort by the                    Genetics Section to encourage the application of molecular                      genetics to botanical problems.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE BOTANICAL SOCIETY OF AMERICA, INCORPORATED
